name: Solar Rain
description:
Solar Rain

Solar Rain, the super stellar space shooter ... in SPACE!  Fight off enemy ships as you gather PowerUps, hone your craft and blast them all to bits. 

Post your best high score!

This weekend project was developed in Construct 2 with the use of Kenny Free Assets and music from Incompetech.

Features
  • 2D Gameplay
  • 3 Enemy Ship Types
  • Kenny Assets
  • Incremental Difficulty
  • Made in Construct 2
